alert.note: Alert for Glacier (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 8:35PM MDT until August 23 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Glacier County in north central Montana... * Until 900 PM MDT. * At 835 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 13 miles northeast of North Browning, or 25 miles west of Cut Bank, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Glacier County. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
